mapper.select: /* ContactUsEngMapper.selectEngContactUsInfo */ select contact_id , contact_type , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(contact_nm), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as contact_nm , contact_title , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(contact_phone), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as contact_phone , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(contact_mail), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as contact_mail , contact_contents , contact_recontents , contact_pw , contact_agree , DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_datetime , contact_process from tb_contact_us_en where contact_id = #{id}
